snippet: Google Inc suffered a service outage on Friday that briefly took down Gmail, the email service used by hundreds of millions of people and many businesses across the globe....

headline.print_headline: Google Fixes Gmail After Brief Outage Around the World
headline.main: Google Fixes Gmail After Brief Outage Around the World

lead_paragraph: Google Inc suffered a service outage on Friday that briefly took down Gmail, the email service used by hundreds of millions of people and many businesses across the globe.
